summary: A roguish poet is given the run of the scheming Wazir's harem while pretending to help him usurp the young caliph.
cast: Howard Keel|Ann Blyth|Dolores Gray|Vic Damone|Monty Woolley|Sebastian Cabot|Jay C. title: Un extraño en el paraíso
